mapper.insert: insert into boards (b_title, b_content, created_at, b_views, b_likes, mem_id, filename) values(#{b_title},#{b_content},sysdate,0,0,#{mem_id},#{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum TEST, t.* FROM (SELECT * FROM boards ORDER BY CREATED_AT desc) t) WHERE TEST BETWEEN #{endRow}-9 AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: update boards set b_views=#{b_views} where b_idx=#{b_idx}
